alert.note: Alert for Beadle; Brookings; Brule; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner; Moody; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued February 22 at 8:55AM MST until February 23 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO MIDNIGHT CST TONIGHT... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM CST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 below zero. For the Winter Weather and Wind Chill Advisory, light snow and blowing snow with wind chill values 15 below to 30 below. Additional snow accumulations of around an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of central, east central and south central South Dakota and southwest Minnesota. This includes the tribal lands of the Flandreau Santee Sioux Tribal Nation. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to 10 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 6 PM CST this evening. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 6 PM this evening to midnight CST tonight. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Beadle; Brookings; Brule; Jerauld; Kingsbury; Lake; Miner; Moody; Sanborn
